metadata.title: Aïcha Imène DAHOUMANE — Salesforce & IT Ops
metadata.description: Portfolio: projets, articles et services en Salesforce, intégration, DevOps et IT Ops.

profile.title: From systems & networks to Salesforce development
profile.p1: A technical profile with a strong IT infrastructure background, now fully focused on Salesforce and cloud consulting.
profile.p2: I started my career on the infrastructure side as a junior systems and network administrator. I provided user support, managed Windows environments, monitored networks, and handled security incidents. This hands-on experience taught me how systems behave in real life, how teams collaborate under pressure, and why solid foundations matter.
profile.p3: Today, I specialize in Salesforce development and administration. After completing the Salesforce Developer path at OpenClassrooms and working on Apex, Flows, and CI/CD with Salesforce CLI, I help organizations automate processes, improve data quality, and build secure, maintainable solutions.
profile.p4: I do my best work in environments that value autonomy, transparency, and continuous learning. My 2026 goal is to work internationally as a freelance Salesforce developer & consultant, collaborating with distributed teams and clients in France and abroad.
profile.p1_salesforce: Salesforce developer & consultant: I design reliable, secure, maintainable solutions with a strong focus on user experience and delivery quality.
profile.p2_salesforce: I work with Apex, Flows, data models, security (permission sets, sharing), and CI/CD pipelines (Salesforce CLI, GitHub Actions) to ship cleanly to production.
profile.p3_salesforce: My systems & DevOps background helps me approach Salesforce with an operations mindset: observability, risk management, documentation, and automation—so solutions stay robust over time.
profile.p4_salesforce: My 2026 goal: grow an international Salesforce freelance activity, collaborating with distributed teams while continuing to strengthen both my technical and functional expertise.
profile.p1_itops: IT Ops & DevOps: I help teams design, maintain, and secure resilient infrastructure, with pragmatic operations processes (runbooks, monitoring, remediation).
profile.p2_itops: I implement operations standards: actionable monitoring/alerting, noise reduction, escalation procedures, documentation, and automation (scripts, jobs, playbooks).
profile.p3_itops: I pay close attention to security and continuity: backups, hardening, access management, and change practices to reduce incidents.
profile.p4_itops: My 2026 goal: take on IT Ops / SRE / DevOps missions focused on reliability, automation, and security—in France and internationally.
profile.basedInValue: Paris — open to relocation, full-remote, or hybrid
profile.rolesValue: Salesforce Developer, Salesforce Administrator, Salesforce / IT Consultant
profile.goalValue: From early 2026, gradually build an international freelance activity as a Salesforce developer while continuing to strengthen my technical and functional expertise at LD Digitales.

privacy.title: Privacy & legal notice
privacy.analyticsBody: This site does not use tracking analytics by default.
privacy.cookiesBody: No marketing cookies are set. Only essential technical cookies may be used by the platform (e.g., for security).
privacy.formBody: When you submit the contact form, your name, email, topic and message are processed to reply to you. If Formspree is enabled, the data is forwarded to Formspree for delivery.
privacy.retention: Retention: messages are kept only as long as necessary to handle your request.
